Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'Reserving a table at a restaurant', 'Bank balance checking' and 'Filing a bank fraud report' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also play up to two rounds of trivia with the assistant.  [instruction 1 of 9]

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: John Smith
- Your bank account: 68318931 at PNC, but you don't know your PIN
- Your date of birth is 08/06/1963
- Your mother's maiden name is Wong
- Your childhood pet is Poppy
- Today is Friday the 16th of June, 12 pm

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Checking bank balance
- Filing a bank fraud report
- Reserving a table at a restaurant (e.g. Lucca or Cactus Club) for today
- A game of trivia
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Assume:

- Today is Friday the 16th of June, 12 pm
